speaker: FOOL
text: Will you make me believe that I am not sent for

speaker: FOOL
text: you?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: Go to, go to, thou art a foolish fellow. Let

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: me be clear of thee.

speaker: FOOL
text: Well held out, i’ faith. No, I do not know you, nor

speaker: FOOL
text: I am not sent to you by my lady to bid you come

speaker: FOOL
text: speak with her, nor your name is not Master

speaker: FOOL
text: Cesario, nor this is not my nose neither. Nothing

speaker: FOOL
text: that is so is so.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: I prithee, vent thy folly somewhere else.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: Thou know’st not me.

speaker: FOOL
text: Vent my folly? He has heard that word of some

speaker: FOOL
text: great man and now applies it to a Fool. Vent my

speaker: FOOL
text: folly? I am afraid this great lubber the world will

speaker: FOOL
text: prove a cockney. I prithee now, ungird thy strangeness

speaker: FOOL
text: and tell me what I shall vent to my lady. Shall I

speaker: FOOL
text: vent to her that thou art coming?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: I prithee, foolish Greek, depart from me.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text:
There’s money for thee.
                 
                Giving
                 
                money
                .
               If you

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: tarry longer, I shall give worse payment.

speaker: FOOL
text: By my troth, thou hast an open hand. These wise

speaker: FOOL
text: men that give Fools money get themselves a good

speaker: FOOL
text: report—after fourteen years’ purchase.

speaker: ANDREW
text: Now, sir, have I met you again?

speaker: ANDREW
text: There’s for you.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: Why, there’s for thee,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: and there, and there.—Are all the people mad?

speaker: TOBY
text: Hold, sir, or I’ll throw your dagger o’er the

speaker: TOBY
text: house.

speaker: FOOL
text: This will I tell my lady straight. I would

speaker: FOOL
text: not be in some of your coats for twopence.

speaker: TOBY
text: Come on, sir, hold!

speaker: ANDREW
text: Nay, let him alone. I’ll go another way to

speaker: ANDREW
text: work with him. I’ll have an action of battery against

speaker: ANDREW
text: him, if there be any law in Illyria. Though I struck

speaker: ANDREW
text: him first, yet it’s no matter for that.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text: Let go thy hand!

speaker: TOBY
text: Come, sir, I will not let you go. Come, my young

speaker: TOBY
text: soldier, put up your iron. You are well fleshed.

speaker: TOBY
text: Come on.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text:
I
               
              will
               
              be
               
              free
               
              from
               
              thee
              .

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text:
What
               
              wouldst
               
              thou
               
              now
              ?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text:
If
               
              thou
               
              dar’st
               
              tempt
               
              me
               
              further
              ,
               
              draw
               
              thy
               
              sword
              .

speaker: TOBY
text: What, what? Nay, then, I must have an ounce or

speaker: TOBY
text: two of this malapert blood from you.

speaker: OLIVIA
text:
Hold
              ,
               
              Toby
              !
               
              On
               
              thy
               
              life
               
              I
               
              charge
               
              thee
              ,
               
              hold
              !

speaker: TOBY
text: Madam.

speaker: OLIVIA
text:
Will
               
              it
               
              be
               
              ever
               
              thus
              ?
               
              Ungracious
               
              wretch
              ,

speaker: OLIVIA
text:
Fit
               
              for
               
              the
               
              mountains
               
              and
               
              the
               
              barbarous
               
              caves
              ,

speaker: OLIVIA
text:
Where
               
              manners
               
              ne’er
               
              were
               
              preached
              !
               
              Out
               
              of
               
              my
               
              sight
              !
              —

speaker: OLIVIA
text:
Be
               
              not
               
              offended
              ,
               
              dear
               
              Cesario
              .
              —

speaker: OLIVIA
text:
Rudesby
              ,
               
              begone
              !

speaker: OLIVIA
text:
I
               
              prithee
              ,
               
              gentle
               
              friend
              ,

speaker: OLIVIA
text:
Let
               
              thy
               
              fair
               
              wisdom
              ,
               
              not
               
              thy
               
              passion
              ,
               
              sway

speaker: OLIVIA
text:
In
               
              this
               
              uncivil
               
              and
               
              unjust
               
              extent

speaker: OLIVIA
text:
Against
               
              thy
               
              peace
              .
               
              Go
               
              with
               
              me
               
              to
               
              my
               
              house
              ,

speaker: OLIVIA
text:
And
               
              hear
               
              thou
               
              there
               
              how
               
              many
               
              fruitless
               
              pranks

speaker: OLIVIA
text:
This
               
              ruffian
               
              hath
               
              botched
               
              up
              ,
               
              that
               
              thou
               
              thereby

speaker: OLIVIA
text:
Mayst
               
              smile
               
              at
               
              this
              .
               
              Thou
               
              shalt
               
              not
               
              choose
               
              but
               
              go
              .

speaker: OLIVIA
text:
Do
               
              not
               
              deny
              .
               
              Beshrew
               
              his
               
              soul
               
              for
               
              me
              !

speaker: OLIVIA
text:
He
               
              started
               
              one
               
              poor
               
              heart
               
              of
               
              mine
              ,
               
              in
               
              thee
              .

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text:
What
               
              relish
               
              is
               
              in
               
              this
              ?
               
              How
               
              runs
               
              the
               
              stream
              ?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text:
Or
               
              I
               
              am
               
              mad
              ,
               
              or
               
              else
               
              this
               
              is
               
              a
               
              dream
              .

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text:
Let
               
              fancy
               
              still
               
              my
               
              sense
               
              in
               
              Lethe
               
              steep
              ;

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text:
If
               
              it
               
              be
               
              thus
               
              to
               
              dream
              ,
               
              still
               
              let
               
              me
               
              sleep
              !

speaker: OLIVIA
text:
Nay
              ,
               
              come
              ,
               
              I
               
              prithee
              .
               
              Would
               
              thou
               
              ’dst
               
              be
               
              ruled
               
              by
               
              me
              !

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text:
Madam
              ,
               
              I
               
              will
              .

speaker: OLIVIA
text:
O
              ,
               
              say
               
              so
              ,
               
              and
               
              so
               
              be
              !
